{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03396v1", "title": "Quantitative lower bound for solutions to the Boltzmann equation in
  non-convex domains", "summary": "In this article we deal with the continuous mild solutions of the Boltzmann
equation in a bounded space domain, either with angular cutoff or non cutoff
assumption. Without assuming that the space domain is convex, we construct a
Maxwellian lower bound in the cutoff case, and a weaker-than-Maxwellian lower
bound in the non-cutoff case, thus extending results of \cite{Bri 1,Bri 2} in
which the domain was assumed to be convex.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-05-06T10:20:44Z"}
